import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import logo from './img/logo.png' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBars, faClose } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faDiscord, faGithub, faInstagram, faTelegram } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import { Route, BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import HistoryPage from './HistoryPage' export default function App() { const cash = useSelector(state => state.money.current) const money = useRef('') const closeBtn = useRef(null) const burgerBlock = useRef(null) const changerClass = (block) => { block.classList.toggle('active') } return (
changerClass(burgerBlock.current)} className="burger">
Convert History
) }
